title: Can't order Pixel 4a at my pincode and several other pincodes
content:
I tried ordering Pixel 4a via flipkart but every time it comes in stock it shows that it cannot be delivered to my pincode. I tried several other pincodes too but the results were same. 
Even the seller is not delivering in the National Capital region. 
Why so much hype if you can't deliver your product ?
